dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Intruder! You dare step into our territory? Prepare to be melted!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no quarrel with you. Let me pass and I'll leave you be.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: No quarrel? Your presence itself is an affront!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then you leave me no choice but to destroy you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You'll find no easy prey here!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well. Let's end this.
I doubt you'll find me an easy target either.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words for someone who'll soon be nothing but a puddle!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no intention of fighting you. We can coexist.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexist? In this shattered realm? Foolishness!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Believe what you will, but I'm serious. What do you want?
Is there no way for us to come to an agreement?
If you insist on fighting, at least tell me why.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I need no reason beyond your trespass!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then let's fight.
A shame. We could have been allies.
Your threats mean nothing to me. Stand aside.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Big words for a doomed fool!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'd like to see you try and doom me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it! Prepare for suffering!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Not if I make you suffer first.
This isn't a game, ooze.
Do you really think you can stop me?
Prove it then.
On second thought, maybe I'll spare you.
Running away is your best option.
Then face your end with dignity.
Last chance. Run or face me.
I'm here for something, and nothing will stand in my way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You'll find nothing but pain here!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then bring the pain!
Let's see who endures.
I can endure more than you can imagine.
Do you really want to die trying to stop me?
So be it. Prepare to die.
Then I'll make it quick.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Not if I kill you first!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You don't have to die. Move aside.
Then meet your end.
Foolish, but your choice.
